documents.document: @sir_cornflake @HullCity asking for too much I would have thought

Wonder why I bother sometimes
What a guy https://t.co/w0O02QFMuv
My first son is going to be called Eldin #hcafc
@Uzzell01 totally agree! Feel like Liverpool are there for the taking at the minute too...
@RobIves597 probably should have won it at the end, Markovic incredibly unlucky and Hernandez should have done better mate
Huddlestone and Maguire were different gravy #hcafc
That Jakupovic save from Mata though #hcafc
What a fucking result that is, unbelievable performance from the boys #hcafc
Fuck sake, in said we would sign no one else #hcafc https://t.co/XwsYg9w4NJ
What's the odds on us signing no one else? Cause I can see it happening #hcafc
Wish him nothing but luck though, been a great servant to us!!! #hcafc
Doesn't make a whole lot of sense letting Bruce leave, type of player we could do with as well absolute fighter #hcafc
Sounds like a terrible performance, shows our lack of depth in the squad and how badly we need more signings! #hcafc
These Nani rumours have got to be a joke right? #hcafc
RIP John Hurt, what a sad sad loss!
Real shame the way Snodgrass left, not wanting to play or train! Thought he was better than that, onwards and upwards #hcafc
Take it Snodgrass refused to play for us then? Fit enough to pass a medical! #hcafc
@PatrickSutton I think he's one of them for me but each to their own :)
@SportsJonny so do I but snods obviously didn't wanna play for us anymore so no good to us! Hopefully he gets to reinvest it
Plus his heart wasn't in it anymore, can't afford to carry players in our situation #hcafc
Snodgrass is one of the best players I've seen in a city shirt but we've proved we can play without him #hcafc
Imagine how much of a hero snodgrass would be if he decided to stay? No chance of it happening like #hcafc
Don't cry mate cause we ended your unbeaten run with a barely fit squad #hcafc https://t.co/osPvE4MR2O
Gutted to be out but the lads have done themselves proud again plus nice confidence boost going into the next #hcafc
@davey_bennett @AwayDaysVideos haha yeah that would help!
Wouldn't you love to see this at the kc? #hcafc https://t.co/uTA8NjHDjS
Still get the feeling the allams are doing this out of spite, to get one over on us #hcafc
'Were not a selling club' sells two of the best players the club has for way less than what they should have #hcafc
Maguire will be next no doubt after his recent performances! #hcafc
@davey_bennett maybe I cursed us!!!! #hcafc
@paulashby3 heard it was the other way round
@paulashby3 yeah I know but they pulled out which says everything you need to know, don't remember him been good there either
Fuck off Burnley #hcafc
@paulashby3 says something if Sunderland don't want him and can't get into there team
Don't buy into the Yann M'Vila rumours #hcafc
Something feels off at the minute, the city Twitter page seem to be listening and engaging with fans #hcafc

@melissaa_lauren say hi to Scott for me please while your tonguing his arse
@melissaa_lauren Melissa Scott's got his own phone, tell him to stop been so controlling
Gone Baby Gone is tonight's film
@HannahWragby @TomosHefin @KatieLouise_8 don't get her hopes up kids, live halfway round the world now
@RobIves597 @HullCity probably asking for too much there mate
Feels like another Ben Arfa or Ramirez but will support the man and give him a chance! #hcafc https://t.co/xPXCJjhMFD
Not sure how I feel a about this #hcafc https://t.co/uii1n4szTM
Thank god mason is in a stable condition, now lets just pray and hope he makes a speedy recovery! #hcafc
Really hope @RyanMason pulls through, thoughts and prayers are with him! #hcafc
You feel like performances like that will see us pick up more points then drop, especially with plenty of teams to play around us #hcafc
Sounds like a very good performance from us, shock the referee sticking by the big club! Onto the next one lads #hcafc
So that's Snodgrass gone then? #hcafc
@thetoogood91 Manchester by the sea is a cracking film mate
The week when the allams could have tried to build bridges, they burn even more utterly fucking clueless morons! #hcafc
Honestly would not surprise me if this was the allams way of 'getting back' at the fans, cause that's what it feels like #hcafc
Just when we were all building some optimism up the allams have well and truly crushed it this week, absolute arseholes! #hcafc
Devastated about Livermore leaving, stuck by each other through thick and thin, been a wonderful asset! #hcafc
Â£10 million for Livermore is a joke and so much for us not being a selling club Ehab?! Fucking Wanker #hcafc
BREAKING NEWS: Phil Jevons has just passed a medical and is going to pen a 3 year deal, fee undisclosed #hcafc
Id take Ulloa in a heartbeat #hcafc

Skiing was class and I didn't die, so all round top day!
Just out of curiosity, with us not having a RB in our squad, who would we rather signed ? #hcafc
Good Will Hunting never gets old, outstanding film!

Lovely goal Abel's 2nd, shows what he's capable of when he turns up and got good support around him! #hcafc
Fucking get in there city, what a massive 3 points that is! Sounds like a good 2nd half, good to See Abel back in the goals #hcafc

@thetoogood91 @Tigertully @sir_cornflake wouldn't surprise me if he sells snoddy and settles for 2 maybe 3 loan signings

In a world full of Kardashians, be a Meryl Streep!

@mattworman that's a shame, one of the most talented players I've seen play for city, very consistent in our relegation season
